backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing notes, events, and settings with per-user maps and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries for many frontend files including hooks, services, components, and utilities.
frontend/IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md: Implementation plan describing architecture, features, milestones, and required backend/frontend components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes wrapped in theme provider and AuthGate-protected pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with header, navigation, footer, and principal display using auth state.
frontend/src/components/layout/PrimaryNa: Navigation bar component rendering route buttons with active state tracking.
frontend/src/core/crypto/encryptionServi: Provides AES-GCM encryption/decryption with key generation, storage in localStorage, and reset utilities.
frontend/src/core/errors/formatError.ts: Maps common error message patterns to user-friendly strings with fallbacks.
frontend/src/core/query/queryKeys.ts: Defines structured React Query keys for notes, events, and settings.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Wraps content with authentication checks and shows login UI or loading state.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Renders a sign-in/out button and handles login/logout logic with fallback handling.
frontend/src/features/auth/hooks/useAuth: Exposes authentication state and actions using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/index.ts: Re-exports auth components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/src/features/auth/utils/princip: Shortens long principal IDs for display.
frontend/src/features/calendar/component: Displays daily events with times, details, loading state, and delete actions.
Form for creating events with optional prefill and time handling.
Renders a month grid with navigation, selected state, and event indicators.
frontend/src/features/calendar/hooks/use: Provides calendar-related React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting events.
frontend/src/features/calendar/index.ts: Exports calendar page and related hooks.
frontend/src/features/calendar/pages/Cal: Full calendar page combining month view, daily agenda, and event creation with error handling.
frontend/src/features/calendar/services/: Wraps backend actor calls for creating, deleting, and fetching events for a day.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/pages/Da: Displays recent notes and today's events with navigation and loading states.
frontend/src/features/notes/components/N: Provides a note editing UI with optional event creation based on extracted date/time suggestions.
Renders a list of notes with selection, deletion, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/features/notes/hooks/useDat: Debounces note text and extracts date/time suggestions using a parser.
frontend/src/features/notes/hooks/useNot: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes via NotesService.
frontend/src/features/notes/index.ts: Re-exports NotesPage, note query hooks, and note-related types.
frontend/src/features/notes/nlp/dateTime: Parses text for dates and times in various formats and returns a confidence-scored suggestion.
frontend/src/features/notes/pages/NotesP: Implements the main notes page with note selection, creation, editing, deletion, and event creation from notes.
frontend/src/features/notes/services/not: Handles note CRUD operations and encrypts/decrypts private note content using the backend actor and encryption service.
frontend/src/features/notes/types.ts: Defines note view model plus input types for creating and updating notes.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: UI panel for viewing, generating, and resetting the local encryption key with related status and dialogs.
Provides a UI for toggling dark mode using theme state.
frontend/src/features/settings/hooks/use: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user settings through the SettingsService.
frontend/src/features/settings/index.ts: Re-exports settings page and settings-related hooks.
frontend/src/features/settings/pages/Set: Settings page layout containing encryption key and UI preference panels.
frontend/src/features/settings/services/: Wraps backend settings operations and exposes encryption key utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's architecture, features, and design rules for a layered Flutter app with authentication, encryption, NLP, and calendar-related modules.
